Hero.title: Distinctive
Hero.description: We offer complete kitchen solutions designed to fit every space and meet every expectation — from refined luxury to smart practicality.

GalleryNass0.title: Distinguished
GalleryNass0.description: A design that combines elegance and durability with MDF panels finished with PVC coating for a modern, easy-to-clean look, and premium wood columns that add a touch of sophistication and high quality. Your optimal choice for practical beauty in every detail.

GalleryNass1.title: Aluminum
GalleryNass1.description: Modern prep kitchen with an aluminum internal structure for lasting durability, and double-sheet aluminum doors with MDF wood touch for natural elegance. First-grade beige quartz countertop adds luxury and sophistication.

GalleryNass2.title: Design
GalleryNass2.description: Luxurious main kitchen featuring internal aluminum structure, doors with PVC-finished MDF and natural wood mix, elegant nano white quartz surface, and equipped with latest premium appliances and accessories.

philosophy.title: Design That Combines
philosophy.description: Every element is carefully selected to provide not just aesthetic beauty, but functional excellence that enhances your daily cooking experience. From the durable aluminum structure to the premium accessories, this kitchen is built to last while maintaining its elegance.

GalleryNass3.title: Practical
GalleryNass3.description: Elegant design combining practicality and beauty: TV Unit, buffet table, and hidden door from PVC-finished MDF wood, and living room washbasin in quartz (terrazzo) with mirror touch that adds depth and elegance to the space.

items.tvUnitAlt: TV Unit with PVC-finished MDF wood
items.washbasinAlt: Living room washbasin in quartz terrazzo
items.mirrorAlt: Mirror detail adding depth and elegance

GalleryNass4.title: Kitchen
GalleryNass4.description: Elegant contemporary kitchen from kitchenCore that combines beauty and practicality, with spacious cabinets and soft lighting adding a refined touch to the space. The central island provides ideal space for preparation and serving with complete comfort.

items.contemporaryDesc: Spacious cabinets with soft lighting adding a refined touch. Central island provides ideal space for preparation and serving.
items.premiumDesc: Simple and organized design with high-quality finishing. Optimal space utilization for maximum functionality.

VideoShowcase.title: Experience
VideoShowcase.description: Watch our kitchen transformations come to life. See the quality, precision, and attention to detail that defines Kitchen Core.
VideoShowcase.video1Description: Kitchen Core offers a complete solution for kitchens that combine high quality and modern design. The internal structure is made entirely of aluminum to ensure durability and efficiency in the long term. The external facades are made of PVC material, designed carefully to give an elegant and lasting appearance.
VideoShowcase.video2Description: Modern design with high quality adds a refined touch to every corner of your home.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your
cta.description: Experience the perfect blend of durability and elegance. Our aluminum structures and PVC finishes ensure your kitchen stays beautiful for years to come.

palace.title: Palace Kitchen Design
palace.description: Bespoke kitchen architecture for palatial residences combining classical grandeur with modern culinary technology.

villa.title: Villa Kitchen Fit-Out
villa.description: Complete kitchen solutions for luxury villas featuring handcrafted details and state-of-the-art equipment.

estate.title: Estate Kitchen Systems
estate.description: Holistic kitchen design for private estates with butler's pantries, prep kitchens, and entertaining spaces.

About.title: Creating Solutions That Fit Your Vision
About.description1: For over fifteen years, we've been transforming ideas into exceptional spaces — we listen, understand, and design beyond expectations.
About.description2: Our approach starts with understanding your unique needs, then we apply our design expertise to solve every challenge with creative and practical solutions.
About.description3: From modern kitchens to classic designs, and from lasting aluminum to luxurious wood — every project carries a distinctive design signature that reflects your personal style.
About.recognizedByValue:
150+ Completed Projects
Unique Designs for Every Client
About.awardsValue:
Innovative Design Solutions
Exceptional Execution Quality
About.metaDescription: Discover Kitchen Core - specialists in designing and executing kitchen and interior space solutions with over 15 years of experience in solving design challenges with creative approaches.

Contact.title: Let's Create Your Dream Kitchen
Contact.description: Schedule a private consultation to discuss your vision. We work exclusively with clients who value exceptional quality and timeless design.

Partnerships.title: Trusted by the World's Best Brands

Portfolio.title: Engineering Excellence
Portfolio.description: Each project showcases our technical expertise, innovative solutions, and uncompromising commitment to quality. Explore the details.

modernWooden.title: Modern Wooden Kitchens
modernWooden.slogan: Precise design and smart details — elegant simplicity with functionality that fits modern living.

classicWooden.title: Classic Wooden Kitchens
classicWooden.slogan: Timeless elegance — luxurious details that express warmth and sophistication.

aluminum.title: Aluminum Kitchens
aluminum.slogan: A lasting practical solution — durable designs that deliver beauty without maintenance.

bedrooms.title: Bedrooms & Wardrobes
bedrooms.slogan: Spaces that reflect your style — smart organization giving every piece its place for an easier start every day.

hero.title: Where Craftsmanship Meets
hero.description: Discover the passion, expertise, and dedication that drives Kitchen Core to create exceptional luxury kitchens for the world's most discerning clients.

company.title: Design That Starts With Understanding Your Needs
company.description: Kitchen Core specializes in transforming spaces into functional and beautiful environments. For over 15 years, we've been delivering innovative design solutions that combine beauty with practicality — from kitchens to bedrooms and interior spaces.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We listen to your vision, understand your challenges, and create design solutions that fit your space and lifestyle — every project is unique, every detail is thoughtful.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the first choice for those seeking innovative design and professional execution — we build long-term relationships with our clients through quality, commitment, and creativity.

team.title: The Experts Behind
team.description: Our talented team of designers, engineers, and craftsmen work together to bring your vision to life with precision and passion.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your
cta.description: Let's create a space that reflects your unique style and elevates your culinary experience.

projects.title: Our Projects | Kitchen Core
projects.description: Explore our portfolio of luxury kitchen designs for palaces, villas, and premium estates across the Middle East.
